CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 1 , the aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers also enhanced with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains ( from n = 10 to 16 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PffBB-n polymers

These are the polymers under discussion in the paragraph. The "n" in PffBB-n indicates that there is a variable parameter in the name of the material. In this context, "n" represents the size of the alkyl side chains. Therefore, PffBB-n is the material name entity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PffBB-n polymers

This is the only material name entity in the paragraph. The other entities, such as "Figure 1" and "alkyl side chains," are not material names but rather descriptors or contextual information.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 1 , the aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers also enhanced with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains ( from n = 10 to 16 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Figure 1
2. Aggregation ability / strength
3. PffBB-n polymers
4. Size of the alkyl side chains
5. n (subscript)
6. Alkyl side chains (plural)
7. Size (of alkyl side chains)

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Aggregation ability / strength
2. Size (of alkyl side chains)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Aggregation ability / strength

So, the only Material Property entity in the paragraph is "Aggregation ability / strength".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 1 , the aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers also enhanced with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains ( from n = 10 to 16 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Figure 1: This is not a property value entity, but rather a reference to a figure or image.
2. Aggregation ability / strength: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n polymers.
3. Size of the alkyl side chains: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n polymers.
4. From n = 10 to 16: This is a range of values for the property "size of the alkyl side chains".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Aggregation ability / strength: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n polymers with a value that enhances as the size of the alkyl side chains increases.
2. Size of the alkyl side chains: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n polymers with a value ranging from 10 to 16.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value                   |
|-------------------------------|
| Aggregation ability / strength |
| of PffBB-n polymers          |
| Enhances as size of alkyl side chains increases |
| Size of alkyl side chains    |
| Ranges from 10 to 16          |
